#include <stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define lprn(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define lpr(x) printf("%lld ",x)
#define lp(x) for(i=0;i<x;i++)
#define jlp(x) for(j=0;j<x;j++)
#define loop(x,p) for(i=x;i<=p;i++)
#define fill(a,v) memset(a,v,sizeof(a))
#define INF 1e9
#define int long long
#define LLINF LLONG_MAX;
//#define all(x)( x.begin(), x.end() )
#define PI 2*acos(0.0)
#define ll long long
#define MOD 1000000007             //10^9+7
#define sq(x) ((x)*(x))
#define nl p('\n')
#define pcase printf("Case %lld: ",cases)


#ifdef ONLINE_JUDGE
    #define g getchar_unlocked
    #define p putchar_unlocked
#else
   #define g getchar
   #define p putchar
#endif





inline ll rd()
{
    ll x=0;
    int sign=1;
    char c;
    while(((c=g())<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-');
    if(c=='-')
    sign=-1,c=g();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+c-48,c=g();
    return sign*x;
}

char cg()
{
    char c=g();
    while(c==' '||c=='\n')
        c=g();
    return c;
}

char s1[1003],ans[1004];
//string s1,ans;
ll temp;


main()
{
    ll  t,i,j,cases;
    for(t=rd(),cases=1;cases<=t;cases++)
    {  // pcase;

        scanf("%s",s1);
        //ans.resize(1200);
        ll k=rd();
        ll x=0;
        ll i=strlen(s1)-1;
        //ll i=s1.length();
        ll carry=0;
        while(k&&i>=0)
        {

             temp=s1[i]+k%2+carry-'0';
            if(temp<2)
               {ans[x++]=temp+'0';carry=0;}
            else if(temp==2){
                   ans[x++]='0';
                   carry=1;
                 }
             else {
                ans[x++]=1+'0';
                carry=1;
             }
            //printf("ans is %c\n",ans[x-1]);
                 i--;k/=2;
        }
        while(k)
        {
         temp=k%2+carry;
            if(temp<2)
               {ans[x++]=temp+'0';carry=0;}
            else if(temp==2){
                   ans[x++]='0';
                   carry=1;
                 }
             else {
                ans[x++]=1+'0';
                carry=1;
             }
             //printf("ans is %c\n",ans[x-1]);
                 k/=2;
        }
        while(i!=-1)
        {

            ll temp=s1[i]+carry-'0';
            if(temp<2)
               {ans[x++]=temp+'0';carry=0;}
            else if(temp==2){
                   ans[x++]='0';
                   carry=1;
                 }
             else {
                ans[x++]=1+'0';
                carry=1;
             }
             //printf("ans is %c\n",ans[x-1]);
                 i--;
        }

        if(carry)
          ans[x++]=carry+'0';

 for(i=x-1;i>=0;i--)
    printf("%c",ans[i]);
printf("\n");
//pcase;
    }


 return 0;
}
